sentences.sContent: You don't have to sacrifice environmental protection to promote economic growth.
sentences.sCn: 你们没有必要牺牲环保来促进经济增长。

...Kapur has identified three conditions that promote this kind of beneficial struggle...
...European countries are passing laws that would force companies to promote more women to the executive suite...

...These people who promote the perfect body really don’t care about you at all...

remMethod.val: pro(向前) ＋ mot(动) ＋ e → 向前动 → 促进， 增进

words.tran: 提升，[劳经] 晋升；推销，促销；促进；发扬，振兴

trans.tranOther: If people promote something, they help or encourage it to happen, increase, or spread
